segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children on the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching towards the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I see now – he's reaching into the 'COOKIE JAR'!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, no doubt grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand up, clearly expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're quite the little conspirators, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky move, considering how wobbly that stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their determination for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret mission is certainly underway without the adult noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before any accidents occur.
segments.speaker: PAR
